Step.Name: Teams
Step.Fetch: <fetch version="1.0" output-format="xml-platform" mapping="logical" distinct="false"> <entity name="team"> <attribute name="name" /> <attribute name="administratorid" /> <attribute name="businessunitid" /> <attribute name="teamid" /> <attribute name="teamtype" /> <attribute name="queueid" /> <order attribute="name" descending="false" /> <filter type="and"> <condition attribute="teamtype" operator="eq" value="0" /> <condition attribute="isdefault" operator="eq" value="0" /> </filter> </entity> </fetch>
